title: Rating stuff: It’s human nature. So where does Trump rank?
description: Chuck Todd recaps a special Covid-focused episode of Meet the Press. Carrie Dann looks at new rankings of all presidents from C-SPAN.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
